cbt.menu.desc.not_unlocked: You have not unlocked this feature yet. Keep playing!
cbt.menu.desc.main_story_first: Maybe worry about getting April back first...
cbt.menu.desc.pick_hotbar: Choose where your items are when you start a Ritual.
cbt.menu.desc.pick_la_biblioteca: View unlocked items and locked items with how to unlock them!
cbt.items.generic.unknown_unlock_method: You're not sure how to unlock this item.
cbt.items.generic.not_unlocked.1: This item hasn't been unlocked yet
cbt.items.generic.default: This item is unlocked by default!
cbt.items.vial.name: Vile Vial
cbt.items.vial.lore.3: at a fountain or up to %s %s
cbt.items.vial.flavor.0: Hphm. Hardly the worst thing I'd
cbt.items.vial.flavor.1: put in my mouth to get her back.
cbt.dialogue.intro.1.u: Easy dear, that was quite the fall.
cbt.dialogue.intro.2.u: Now where was I... It's slipping my mind. I'll just start over.
cbt.dialogue.intro.3.u: I've reincarnated you once more. You won't remember anything for a bit, it takes a few days for all the memories to come back.
cbt.dialogue.intro.4.u: It's been... awhile. The path's been blocked since. Run towards it and tap or hold Sneak to slide under it.
cbt.dialogue.intro.5.u: Just like that. You can also jump while sliding for increased veritcal and horizontal distance.
cbt.dialogue.intro.6.u.1: You'll remember the most about me first. I'm your %s wife. We've been through this a few dozen times before, as you might start to remember.
cbt.dialogue.intro.7.u: Things are a bit different this time, however. I've been banished back to the Hells...
cbt.dialogue.intro.8.u: Hmm, I probably should have led with that. I'm a Demon Lord, so not many religious folk take kindly to me being around. Because we're so intertwined, they also label you as a Demon as well.
cbt.dialogue.intro.9.u: I let my guard down after your last death and they took advantage of that. However, I have a plan.
cbt.dialogue.intro.10.u: You're on your way to one of our cottages right now. There should be some ingredients there to do a Ritual to summon me back.
cbt.dialogue.intro.11.u: As powerful as I may be, no Demon can exit the Hells on their own.
cbt.dialogue.intro.12.u: Huh? Why are there supplies on the ledge?
cbt.dialogue.intro.13.u: Gods damn them, those bastards found this place too. I should've known. You'll need to take care of them. Steal some of their supplies from that chest, and while holding a weapon jump down on them to perform a Pogo attack.
cbt.dialogue.intro.14.u.1: Well, my supplies are all gone. Probably freshly burned if I had to guess.
cbt.dialogue.intro.14.u.2: The welcome back.. uhm, activities will have to wait. You'll need to find the ingredients yourself for the Ritual to get me back. You can head out the back door to get started.
cbt.dialogue.intro.15.u.1: Don't worry about dying, I can just bring you back again now that I found your soul. Dialogue about meta progression.
cbt.dialogue.intro.15.u.2: Good luck honey, I'll be in touch. ♥
cbt.dialogue.intro.16.u: Make sure to grab a Vial from the fountain! It can be used to heal your wounds.
cbt.dialogue.intro.17: This mob will be resummoned to allow experimenting with the Pogo in this safe area.
cbt.dialogue.intro.1.c: Easy, easy. That was quite the fall.
cbt.dialogue.intro.2.c: I guess my teleportation is a bit off... my apologies.
cbt.dialogue.intro.3.c: Allow me to explain myself. You're the closest half-demon alive and I am in dire need of help.
cbt.dialogue.intro.4.c: Ah crap, it has been awhile since I've come through here. Run towards that fallen tree and tap or hold Sneak to slide under it.
cbt.dialogue.intro.5.c: Yeah you get it. You an also jump while sliding for increased vertical and horizontal distance.
cbt.dialogue.intro.6.c: My name is Maple, one of the Divine Demon Lords. Due to unforseen circumstances my sister, April, has been banished to the Hells.
cbt.dialogue.intro.7.c: She's in grief over a recently deceased lover, Pearl... long, long story.
cbt.dialogue.intro.8.c: I cannot leave the Heavens under my oath for another six months, so I need someone like yourself to help me.
cbt.dialogue.intro.9.c: You're heading towards one of my sister's cabins, there should be Ritual supplies there.
cbt.dialogue.intro.10.c: We're going to attempt to bring her lover back from the dead. From there, getting April should be easier.
cbt.dialogue.intro.11.c: Look uhh, I'm sorry I'm dragging you into this. I hope you can find it in your heart to help a fellow demon in need. I promise you will be rewarded greatly when this is over.
cbt.dialogue.intro.12.c: Huh? Why are there supplies on the ledge?
cbt.dialogue.intro.13.c: Gods damned Puritan Demon Hunters, those pests found this place. I should've known. You'll need to take care of them. Steal some of their supplies from that chest, and while holding a weapon jump down on them to perform a Pogo attack.
cbt.dialogue.intro.14.c.1: Well, the supplies are all gone. Probably freshly burned if I had to wager.
cbt.dialogue.intro.14.c.2: You'll need to find the ingredients yourself for the ritual to summon Pearl back. You can head out the back door to get started.
cbt.dialogue.intro.15.c.1: Worry not about dying, I'll make sure you're brought back here before biting the dust.
cbt.dialogue.intro.16.c: Make sure to grab a Vial from the fountain. It can be used to heal your wounds. I promise it's only a little disgusting.
